title: Use API data
text: functions get_ prefix access data directly via SSB API. simple guide use norgeo API functions get codes municipalities selected time period:
code: library(norgeo) dt <- get_code("kommune", from = 2015, to = 2021) # only current geo code dt <- get_code("kommune", from = 2021)

title: Use API data
text: download geo code changes via get_change() function. example download municipalities codes changed 2015 2021.

title: Use API data
text: track municipalities codes changed since 2015 current codes 2021 can done follows: difference get_change() track_change() , former download codes changed later , addition, track changes current codes. can also track geo codes split merged new geo codes function track_split() track_merge().

title: Tracking Geo Code Change of Regional Granularity in Norway
text: Regional granularity levels Norway depicted different codes, undergone several changes years. Identifying codes changed many changes taken place several years can troublesome. package help identify changes track changes taken place. codes based available SSB.

title: Tracking Geo Code Change of Regional Granularity in Norway
text: norgeo package can installed directly CRAN via GitHub page Helseprofil. install CRAN: want install development version use pak package access GitHub. Running codes install development version norgeo.

title: Tracking Geo Code Change of Regional Granularity in Norway
text: data downloaded via API form SSB Klass. learn use different functions norgeo, please read tutorial Get Started

title: Tracking Geo Code Change of Regional Granularity in Norway
text: Among output produced function track_change() follows: output-result data elucidate complexity codes change. Larvik instance, municipality grown 2020 inclusion Lardal. Therefore code Larvik changed twice. Holmestrand? 350 municipalities different code changes, tracking can nightmare. enumeration units ie. grunnkretser 14000 units!

title: Find existing correspond — find_correspond
text: Unlike get_correspond() functions, function find existing correspond specified year correspond codes. Correspond codes can empty nothing changed specific year need get previous year even year previous year etc..etc.. function needed running cast_geo().

Find existing correspond — find_correspond
text: type Higher granularity specified correspond arg. correspond Lower granularity specified type arg. Specify starting year range period. Current year default.

title: Save geo codes — geo_save
text: Geo codes can saved either database management system (DBMS) Excel text file.

title: Save geo codes — geo_save
code: geo_save(   tblname = NULL,   obj = NULL,   des.path = FALSE,   file.type = c("Access", "SQLite", "Excel", "Text"),   db.name = NULL )

title: Save geo codes — geo_save
text: tblname Name table saved obj Object name saved des.path Destination folder file saved file.type Choose file type Access, SQLite, Excel Text db.name choosing DBMS specify database name

what: Get geo code changes with API — get_change
title: Get geo code changes with API — get_change
text: function download geographical code changes SSB via API except enumeration areas (grunnkrets) 1980 2001. code change can found dataset GrunnkretsBefore2002. Basically downloaded data can see directly , example looking code change municipality (kommune). advantage using get_change KLASS can get code changes several years .

title: Get geo code changes with API — get_change
code: get_change(   type = c("fylke", "kommune", "bydel", "grunnkrets"),   from = NULL,   to = NULL,   code = TRUE,   quiet = FALSE,   date = FALSE,   names = TRUE )

title: Get geo code changes with API — get_change
text: type Type regional granularity ie. fylke, kommune etc. Specify starting year range period. Current year default. Specify year end range period. Current year used specified. code TRUE track code changes. Else change name also considered change. quiet TRUE suppress messages changes happened specific time range date Give complete date TRUE else year . Default FALSE names Include names. Default TRUE

title: Get geo code changes with API — get_change
text: dataset class data.table consisting old new code respective year codes changed

title: Get geo code changes with API — get_change

title: Get geo corresponds — get_correspond
text: type Higher granularity specified correspond arg. correspond Lower granularity specified type arg. Specify starting year range period. Current year default. Specify year end range period. Current year used specified. dt Output data.table names Include names. Default TRUE

text: dataset class data.table representing lower geographical level codes corresponding higher geographical levels. example codes enumeration areas corresponding codes municipalities town.

title: norgeo 2.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-02-01 Clean enumeration codes 2002. codes already recoded still exist 2002. codes excluded code change 2002. (#62) Retry connection fail give feedback error connect API (#63) Area codes grunnkrets doesn’t always available API. makes difficult know codes changed multiple times . get_change() ensure area codes grunnkrets created doesn’t exist change table ensure area codes grunnkrets always exist. Thanks @jorgenRM notice error (#65)

title: norgeo 2.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-01-04 functions downloaded data SSB now deactivated. ’s relevant implementing API related functions. (#57) Code change grunnkrets 2003 available GrunnkretsBefore2002. list available via API received directly SSB.

title: norgeo 1.0.0
text: cast_geo() now add unknown grunnkrets respective bydel, kommune fylke. geo code don’t missing codes. add manually available SSB. Fix issues #42. Fix issues #41. Function cast_code now internal . geo codes downloaded via API can cast geo granularity cast_geo Gives error message specification get_correspond() type correspond opposite order. Give error message year specification wrong order. Stop code change specified year running track_change() Add enumerator (grunnkrets) missing 99999999 already available dataset downloaded API. needed merging dataset code able calculate total whole dataset.

title: norgeo 0.9.2
text: API functions now use arguments instead year geo_ functions. matching specification SSB API Klass. New features introduced help working downloaded data API. Now can use: track_change get code changes date specified year argument track_split find geo codes split different geo codes track_merge find geo codes merged new geo

title: norgeo 0.9.1
text: Introduce functions download data via API get_ prefix: get_code function download geo levels via API SSB. get_change function download code changes. get_correspond function get geo codes corresponding granularity. get_set function now wrapper function get_list get_change

title: norgeo 0.9.0
text: real first release version

title: norgeo 1.3.3
text: Despite version 1.3.3 til , unfortunately norgeo actually premature since hasn’t tested properly, released due need use function. much early pull back make rebirth norgeo 0.9 bit properly thought function names structure. course always errors things can better… Anyway, norgeo 1.3.3 norgeo 0.9.0 works ambitious call 1.3.3, hopefully second future version norgeo 1.3.3 much better :-)

title: norgeo 1.3.3
text: ongoing new ideas implemented . contributions bugs reports much welcome.
